title: Constructivist Mathematics Lesson Design: Applying the Negotiation Hierarchy Model

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematics pedagogy, constructivist theory comprehension, and LMS experience
context.additional_context: Cultivating competencies for pre-service teachers to effectively apply a constructivist approach in actual elementary and secondary mathematics instruction

learning_goals: Learners can utilize a mathematics lesson design framework based on constructivist theory through a negotiation hierarchy model.
Learners can develop mathematics instructional materials reflecting multilayered interactions (learner-teacher-content) through a design process with at least three stages.
Learners can design and operate online mathematics learning environments that enable collaborative knowledge building using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
